Text: Enron I am extremely interested in looking at Enron regulatorygovernment affairs and I would appreciate the chance to talk with you if you have some time this week I remembered your name from my first stint in EBS Latin America I worked on a few regulatory issues as part of the origination function and I would be interested to hear your thoughts on career opportunities within your group as well as anything that I can do from a personal standpoint If you have some time please let me know PL Palmer Letzerich Enron Broadband Ventures Tel Cell
